message:
SYSTEM: OWL.pdf: Página 36
Irreflexive Properties
If a property is irreflexive, it can be described as a property that
relates an individual a to individual b, where individual a and
individual b are not the same.
isMotherOf is irreflexive
© O. Corcho, MC Suárez de Figueroa Baonza
71
OWL and SWRL
Exercise
Modelling that a pizza has only one pizza base; and that if a pizza topping has
ingredients then the pizza itself contains also such ingredients

72

ingredients, then the pizza itself contains also such ingredients.
